extracted_playbook.title: Deactivate MODBUS-Server
extracted_playbook.description: Deactivate the MODBUS-Server in the product settings of the web-based management if no MODBUS communication is needed.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply General Security Best Practices
extracted_playbook.description: Use general security best practices to protect systems from local and network attacks. Do not allow direct access to the device from untrusted networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Update to Latest Firmware
extracted_playbook.description: Update to the latest firmware according to the table in chapter solutions.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Defense-in-Depth Strategy for ICS
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure that industrial control systems (ICS) are not directly accessible from the Internet and are protected by consistently applying the defense-in-depth strategy.

extracted_playbook.title: Consult BSI ICS Security Compendium
extracted_playbook.description: Consult the BSI ICS Security Compendium for general information on securing ICS.

extracted_playbook.title: Update Firmware for Specific WAGO Series
